node.title: Romans 8 - Living by the Spirit
node.description:
By the time Paul reaches the eighth chapter he is finally getting warmed up in his treatment of the glorious gospel of Jesus. To make matters abundantly clear he contrasts vividly the difference between a life lived walking after the “flesh” and a life lived by the power of the Spirit. Join Pastor Clark in this exploration of Romans 8, and be inspired by the wonderful privileges afforded us by the gospel!

 

This is a continuation of our series studying the book of Romans.
